#include<stdio.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main(){
int t;
long long int n,l,j,k;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--){
    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
    if(k*(k+1)/2<n)
        printf("-1\n");
    else{
        j=k*(k+1)-2*n;
        l=(long long)(sqrt(1+4*j)-1);
        l=l/2;
        printf("%lld\n",(long long)l);
    }


}
return 0;
}
